price: Kemudian kamu berpaling setelah (adanya perjanjian) itu, maka kalau tidak ada karunia Allah dan rahmat-Nya atasmu, niscaya kamu tergolong orang yang rugi.
arabic: ثُمَّ تَوَلَّيۡتُم مِّنۢ بَعۡدِ ذَٰلِكَۖ فَلَوۡلَا فَضۡلُ ٱللَّهِ عَلَيۡكُمۡ وَرَحۡمَتُهُۥ لَكُنتُم مِّنَ ٱلۡخَٰسِرِينَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: thumma tawallaytum min baʿdi dhālika falawlā faḍlu al-lahi ʿalaykum waraḥmatuhu lakuntum mina al-khāsirīna
